title: One-pot chilli
description: A comforting, family-friendly one-pot chilli recipe that can be made for dinner and enjoyed for lunch the next day too.
ingredients: 400g can pinto or borlotti beans, drained
2 squares dark chocolate (we like Green & Black’s Maya Gold)
A large handful grated mature cheddar, to serve

method.Step 1: Heat the oil in a large pan and cook the onion, celery and garlic for 5 minutes, until softened. Add the cayenne, cumin seeds and paprika and cook for 1 minute more.

method.Step 2: Stir in the beef, beans, tomatoes and stock. Bring to the boil, cover and simmer gently for 1 hour. Stir in the chocolate. Check the seasoning.

method.Step 3: Serve the chilli with the boiled rice and the tortilla chips. Sprinkle with all the grated cheese.
